title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Easily run and chat with local LLMs from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models. Use local LLMs in LangChain chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed open-webui). Runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API to chat, generate, pull models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API with interactive chat, model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chat interface for Ollama with Markdown, code highlighting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat and model management.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and module for Ollama. Declarative model management on NixOS.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama. Simple API to chat, generate, pull and manage models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that wraps Ollama for CI/CD pipelines: generate docs, summarize PRs.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes via Ollama.
